variants.text: We would be grateful if you could forward information about the {{event_name}} to your PhD students and postdocs. This event could provide valuable networking opportunities and insights into the startup ecosystem for early-career researchers.

Could you please share information about the {{event_name}} with relevant departments and researchers at {{organization_name}}? We believe this would be particularly valuable for those interested in {{sector}} entrepreneurship.
We'd appreciate if you could forward this to anyone in your network who might benefit from attending or participating in the {{event_name}}.
We thought you might want to share this opportunity with your portfolio companies or the startups in your ecosystem.
variants.use_case: For VCs/incubators to share with their startups
